comments.comments_text: Bruno Fernandes (Manchester United) swings in the corner, but it's comfortably cleared away.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) swings in the corner, but it's comfortably cleared away.

comments.comments_text: Davide Zappacosta is in a good shooting position, but he sees his teammate and passes the ball to him. Mario Pasalic (Atalanta) takes it nicely and beats the goalkeeper with a precise shot into the bottom left corner to make the score 0:1.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] is in a good shooting position, but he sees his teammate and passes the ball to him. [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) takes it nicely and beats the goalkeeper with a precise shot into the bottom left corner to make the score 0:1.

comments.comments_text: The resulting corner, taken by Luke Shaw (Manchester United), comes to nothing.

comments.comments_text: Goal! The corner is whipped in and Merih Demiral (Atalanta) is in the right place at the right time, planting his header perfectly into the left side of the goal. He makes it 0:2.

comments.comments_text: Marcus Rashford (Manchester United) receives a killer pass, finds himself one-on-one with the goalkeeper and drills the ball into the bottom left corner. Magnificent finish!

comments.comments_text: It looks like Jose Luis Palomino (Atalanta) saw red with that tackle. Szymon Marciniak won't tolerate such behaviour on the pitch and blows for a foul. Manchester Utd win a free kick.
